Module com.example.batallanaval
Package com.example.batallanaval.controller

Interface IGameController

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController, GameControllerAdapter
public interface IGameController
Interface for the main game controller.

Defines the essential methods for managing the game's behavior, UI interactions, and player turns.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Juan Esteban Arias, Junior Lasprilla Prada, Steven Fernando Arag√≥n

      Sets up the player‚Äôs and CPU‚Äôs boards, determines whose turn it is, and displays a custom message.
      Parameters:
      userPlayer - the human player
      cpuBoard - the computer‚Äôs board
      playerTurn - whether it is the human player's turn
      customMessageLabel - a custom message to display on the game UI
